Ingredients.9: 1 (8 ounce) package tempeh (such as Trader Joe's® Organic 3 Grain Tempeh), crumbled

Ingredients.10: 1  red bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.11: 1  yellow bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.12: 1  orange bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.14: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.15: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.16: 1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.17: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained and rinsed

Directions.1: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add carrots; cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add onion and chopped garlic; cook and stir until aromatic, about 3 minutes. Add chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, and cumin; cook and stir for 1 minute. Toss in tempeh, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, and orange bell pepper; cook and stir until tempeh is coated in the spices, about 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Pour tomatoes, black beans, cannellini beans, kidney beans, corn, and brown sugar into the tempeh mixture. Reduce heat to low. Simmer, covered, until flavors are well blended, about 30 minutes.
